audit_history.note: Initial AURORA Root Driver synthesized from existing design docs.

attributes.scope: Analyze, normalize, deduplicate, enrich, and report on bulk data dumps; optionally synchronize privacy-preserving intelligence with trusted peers.

description: Dumptruck exists to securely analyze bulk data dumps (e.g., breach/leak datasets) in a privacy-preserving way, producing actionable reports and building reusable intelligence (deduplication, enrichment, history) while supporting both standalone CLI and HTTPS server operation.
name: Dumptruck: Privacy-Preserving Data Dump Analysis
